query: What motivated her to be an public speaker and coach to find a happy Life?
what is the reason behind her motivation?
response: The main motivation was she was born with debilitating condition that was untreated until her mid 20’s she  judged herself because of her disease.  She goes on to say, “Over time, we begin to focus on our flaws and we falter. It took me a long time to come full circle to love me for me. That’s when she began to ‘Live My True Life’ and realize her  journey is to share it with the world and help others heal too.
